alert.note: Alert for Carter; Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carter and central Ripley Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doniphan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Budapest around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hunter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
